ComicInfo.Summary: Wheels turn wheels as Bruce Banner grapples with how to combat a foe he can neither see nor trace, while Angela and Doc Samson struggle with the man-monster Flux, and each other! Plus: The Hulk must be released in order to give Bruce respite from the misery of his illness, which is exactly what Ryker has been waiting for!

ComicInfo.Title: The Dogs of War, Part 5
